title: Scratch Bread Logo
content:
Can anyone tell me what font is used for the Scratch Bread logo?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [scratch.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100325211314/http:/typophile.com/files/scratch_0.jpg) | 44.5 KB |
author: a-bot

comments.content:
There are some similar ones here, but I didn't see an exact match:

[http://www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=107&page=4&nb\_ppp=50&af=on&text=SCRA...](http://web.archive.org/web/20100325211314/http:/www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=107&page=4&nb_ppp=50&af=on&text=SCRATCHbread "http://www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=107&page=4&nb\_ppp=50&af=on&text=SCRATCHbread")
Judging by the Cs, this one were "grunged up" by hand.
